thread.title: Mamata Banerjee pens devotional song for 'Maa' Durga
thread.title_full: Mamata Banerjee pens devotional song for 'Maa' Durga

title: Mamata Banerjee pens devotional song for 'Maa' Durga
text:
Arvind Kejriwal, Mamata Banerjee meet in Delhi ahead of Bihar polls 
Kolkata: Ahead of the Durga Puja festivities, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee penned a song devoted to the Goddess. 
"Maa or Mother symbolises universal love, affection and well-being of one and all. Her blessings enlighten our lives with joy and happiness. I have penned a song 'Maa Go Tumi Sarbojonin' on the universal Mother," Banerjee posted on Facebook. 
"Mother is always universal. My theme of the lyrics is to highlight that," she said and posted a video of the song on the social networking site.
